attributes.action: 16 to 25 year olds not in, or completed, full time education to fulfil one years service in the armed forces.
attributes.additional_details: On order to instil some discipline, training and morals, into a generation that doesn’t seem to understand these supposedly intrinsic principles, It is proposed that 16 to 25 year olds not involved in, or have completed, relevant full time education, serve 1 years service in the armed forces.  This will have the secondary benefit of bolstering the now over extended and depleted armed forces.
